|brand = Hardkernel |model = ODROID |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -N2+ |revision = REV 0.6 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Amlogic;S922X; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_cores2 = 2 |cpu1_total_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A73 |cpu1_type2 = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 2.2 GHz <!-- 1.8-1.9 GHz --> |cpu1spd2 = 2.0 GHz |gpu1chip1 = Mali;-G52; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = ARM |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- GPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = 864 |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = XTX Tech;XT25Q64D; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = XTX Tech;XT25F01D; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4A8G165WC-BCTD; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1E:06
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;4.9.312;Ubuntu 22.04;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (OTG), USB 3.0, Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 5 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 7.5-16 |pwr_amp_dc = 2-4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 1.8V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module connector, HDMI 2.0, Audio/CVBS, SPDIF out, IR receiver, RTC w/ battery, SPI, I2C, ADC header, UART, GPIO, fan header, heatsink |addchip = CMOS Real Time Clock;NXP;PCF8563;;1;,,, USB 3.1 Gen 1 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL3523;;1;,,, 3-Vrms Audio Driver with Adjustable Gain;DIOO Micro;DIO2133;;1;,,, 3.3V 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/100mA LDO;MPS;NB680;;1;,,, 18V 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Silergy Corp;SY8120B;;2;,,, 300mA Ultra Low Current Voltage Regulator;First Silicon;FC6232;;1;,,, 500mA Bypass Capacitor CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9013;;1;,,, 28V 6A Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8366H;;1;,,, 26V 6A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8756;;2;,,, 2-Channel ESD Protection for USB 3.0;TI;TPD2EUSB30;;8;,,, USB Power Distribution Switch;First Silicon;FC9516A;;2;,,, 300mA CMOS Linear Regulator;First Silicon;FC8731;;3;,,, 0.2A Single Channel Load Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2331;;1;,,, Single Channel Current-Limited Power Switch for USB;JoulWatt;JW7111;;4; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = odroid |defaultpass = odroid |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, Manjaro ARM, Arch Linux (Arm), Armbian, DietPi, CoreELEC, Volumio, Android PIE
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2020 |estprice = 63 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B09W8RBJS4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Korea
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ODROID-N2+", "REV 0.6 20210121", "R-R-HKL-ODROID-N2", and "HARDKERNEL" :are silkscreened on board top. "Design by ruppi.kim@hardkernel.com" is silkscreened on board bottom.
eMMC module connector with modules of 8GB, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB and 128GB available. {{See also|ODROID#Models|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S922X (ARMv8-A) :4x ARM (Cortex-A73) @2.2GHz and :2x ARM (Cortex-A53) @2.0GHz *GPU: Mali-G52 @864MHz *Storage: 8MB (SPI) flash, SDHC Card slot, :eMMC 4.5 connector *RAM: 2GB (DDR4) @1320MHz *USB: 4x USB 3.0, 1x micro USB 2.0 (OTG) ports *Network: 1x GbE port *Power: 12V/2A via barrel recommended
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid-n2/odroid-n2 ''ODROID-N2'' on '''ODROID''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/07/16/odroid-n2-plus-sbc-gets-amlogic-s922x-rev-c-processor-clocked-at-up-to-2-4-ghz/ ''ODROID-N2 Plus SBC Gets Amlogic S922X Rev. C'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/11/08/odroid-n2-plus-review-ubuntu-21-10/ ''ODROID-N2+ review with Ubuntu 21.10'' on '''CNX|Software''']
